name: Connected Worlds: Planetary Conflict
description:
Connected Worlds: Planetary Conflict is a game made for the Ludum Dare 30 game jam. 

In the near future the old god 'Niko'lass Kaje' gathers Planets from all over the cosmos to compete in Planetary Conflict to earn his favour. The prize: Survival.

Juniper, Earf and Hoff. Who will win?
